sentences.en: After their two or three ineffectual attempts, Tom reeled, and fell heavily to the ground.
sentences.cn: 他们徒劳无益地试了两三次之后, 只见汤姆摇晃了两下, 又扑通一声摔倒在地.

sentences.en: He is a well-meaning but ineffectual leader.
sentences.cn: 他是个心有余而力不足的领导者。

sentences.en: He won't be able to deal with the situation; he's too ineffectual.
sentences.cn: 他无法应付局面, 他太无能了.

sentences.en: Our Intelligence Service was untrained, cumbersome, and almost wholly ineffectual.
sentences.cn: 我们的情报部门人员缺乏训练，机构臃肿，简直毫无用处。

sentences.en: Pre - 1987 law made an ineffectual effort to grapple with the problem in section 208.
sentences.cn: 1987年以前的法律就竭力解决第208条中的问题,但效果不明显.

sentences.en: She had felt at the same time that he was helpless and ineffectual.
sentences.cn: 同时她也看到了他的孤弱无能,无所作为.

sentences.en: Teachers often view youth workers as undisciplined and ineffectual.
sentences.cn: 老师们常认为青少年工作者纪律性差且能力低下。

sentences.en: The mayor had become ineffectual in the struggle to clamp down on drugs.
sentences.cn: 市长打击毒品的努力未见成效。

sentences.en: The principal finding aid they offer users -- the card catalogue -- is largely ineffectual.
sentences.cn: 他们提供给读者的主要查找途径 -- 卡片目录 -- 大部分已经失效.

sentences.en: The searchlights were ineffectual in the fog.
sentences.cn: 探照灯在雾中不起作用.

sentences.en: The sun sank down, and in the sky floated a thin , ineffectual moon.
sentences.cn: 夕阳已经西斜, 天空升起一轮淡淡的明月.

sentences.en: The years of ineffectual service count big in the bestowal of rewards.
sentences.cn: 几年徒劳无益的服务,在论功行赏时就大有关系.

sentences.en: Their children were left to the ineffectual care of a parcel of servants.
sentences.cn: 他们的孩子留给了一帮佣人,得不到应有的照管.

sentences.en: They nominated Judge Alton Parker of New York, an obscure and ineffectual third - rate politician.
sentences.cn: 他们提名纽约的奥尔顿·帕克法官为候选人.他是一位既无名望又无能耐的 三流 政客.

words.tran_cn: 无效的，失效的；不起作用的
无用的人；无一技之长者

trans.tran_cn: 无效的，不起作用的，徒劳无益的
trans.tran_en: If someone or something is ineffectual, they fail to do what they are expected to do or are trying to do

trans.tran_cn: 无用的人；无一技之长者
